attributes.action: change the law to ensure that healthcare professionals employed by the NHS are banned from providing private healthcare services from NHS premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of surgeons offer early treatment privately using exactly the same theatre facilities and theatre staff they have available to them under their NHS arrangements.  This means they can supplement their income considerably while the NHS bears most of the cost and CERTAINLY all of the risk because they are obliged to provide emergency cover should anything go wrong.
